| HistoryText             = The Living Bombs were a group of human supremacists, that wanted to deny [[Glossary:Android|androids]] like [[Vision (Earth-616)|Vision]] from gaining equel rights and enable to have relationships with [[Homo sapiens|humans]]. In order to murder Vision, they created explosive devices and strap them on their own bodies. They were almost succesfully in their attempt, when Carol detonated her bomb she brought Vision on the edge of death.

When Vision, was brought to the [[Stark Enterprises Main Plant]] for emergency repair, the terrorists ambushed the laboratory, but their undertaking was thwarted by Vision's [[Avengers (Earth-616)|Avengers]] teammates.{{r|Avengers Vol 1 113}}

Their subsequent activities are unknown.
